EmailTemplate.name: FW: RFQ Application (R. Thacker) (1329759129.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: FW: RFQ Application (R. Thacker) (1329759129.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Randall, I got the contract back form our legal and with your permission I will send the attached redline document over the the client along with the email below. I also wanted to point out to you section 2 c where they reference the time line for invoices, just as an FYI. Please let me know if I have your permission to send to Kim. Thnk you,Sara Email to Client: Dear Kim On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with you and your organization. I have reviewed the agreement and enclosed the revised version with our information. I have included a copy that lists our changes. Here are the list of changes and explination for each one: - Section 7 e Termination – We need the ability to cancel an engagement if we receive the intent to resign from the assigned consultant Section __ Non-Compete - We are likely billing your client for other consultants. What we typically do in this situation is add language to the end of the non-solicitation section, so that we are not in breach when our other members work at your clients.
- Section 8 Indemnity - We prefer to use our standard indemnity language.
- Section 8 Damages/Fees – Although we agree to be in breach should there be a violation of this covenant, we prefer not to have the damage or fee amount pre-determined.
- Section 9 Insurace – please list insurace requiemtnes for this project.
- Section 10 Warrenty - Due to our role as an employer or record for tax purposes and not that of a staffing agency we can not agree repreform or replace. If you are curious about MBO Partners and what we do and how we work, we have a short one page overview that may answer some of your questions, which you may access by <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf">going here.I look forward to working with you, Best regards, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Kim Peart [mailto:KPeart@nw.org]<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Sent: Friday, February 17, 2012 3:44 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: RFQ Application (R. Thacker) Importance: High Sara, Please find attached the letter of agreement and w-9 form, along with other pertinent information regarding the travel and expense policies. In an effort to expedite your application, you may sign the letter of agreement and w-9 and return them via email or fax to 202-347-9164. Once we have received the signed documents, we can proceed to include your information in the Consultant Database. A packet has also been placed in the mail for you; please return one signed letter of agreement and W-9 form to: Attention: Tenia WilsonNeighborWorks America1325 G Street N.W. Suite 800Washington, D.C. 20005 Payment processing will be delayed if the originals are not returned to the office. Feel free to contact Tenia Wilson (202-220-2483) should you have any questions regarding this matter. Please note, the second attachment is part 2 of page 12. Have a great weekend! Kim Peart | Compensation ManagerNeighborWorks America: Working Together for Strong Communities | nw.org 1325 G Street, N.W., Suite 800 | Washington, DC 20005| (202) 220-2314 P please consider the environment before printing this email From: Sara Conde <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]">[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Sent: Thursday, February 16, 2012 10:24 AM To: Kim Peart Cc: <mailto:randst27@yahoo.com">randst27@yahoo.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Subject: RE: RFQ Application (R. Thacker) Hi Kim, It was so nice speaking with you this morning. To summarize our call you will be working with MBO as a corporation rather than Randall as an individual thus, please disregard RFQ part II. I have reattached RFQ part I and our W-9. I look forward to receiving your letter agreement. Please feel free to reach out again with any additional questions. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Wednesday, February 15, 2012 10:39 AM To: 'KPeart@nw.org' Cc: <mailto:randst27@yahoo.com">randst27@yahoo.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> Subject: RE: RFQ Application (R. Thacker) Hi Kim, My name is Sara a Consultant Services Advisor at MBO Partners. Your name was forwarded to me by Randall Thacker. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for <http://www.mbopartners.com/#howwehelp">independent consultants and small businsses who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficently and safely with their contract workforce. We have also put together a short one page collateral that explains how we work and the markets we serve. Attached is part I and II of the RPF along with our W-9 for your reference. Please send your letter of agreement directly to me for our review and signature and do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. ----- Forwarded Message ----- From: Kim Peart < <mailto:KPeart@nw.org">KPeart@nw.org<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> To: 'Randall Thacker' < <mailto:randst27@yahoo.com">randst27@yahoo.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>> Sent: Tuesday, February 14, 2012 10:00 AM Subject: RFQ Application (R. Thacker) Randall, good morning. Please review and complete the attached. Part I of the RFQ application should be completed and submitted, only if your consulting services for NeighborWorks® America will be through an Organization using its Tax Identification Number. If you are completing the RFQ application as an individual, you only need to submit part II. After you have submitted one of the attached, a letter of agreement will then be generated and mailed to you for your signature. Best, Kim Peart | Compensation ManagerNeighborWorks America: Working Together for Strong Communities | <http://nw.org/" target="_blank">nw.org<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal> 1325 G Street, N.W., Suite 800 | Washington, DC 20005| (202) 220-2314 P please consider the environment before printing this email
